question: What part of the car is the key put into?
options: The key is put into the glove compartment of the car.
The key is put into the ignition switch of the car.
The key is inserted into the fuel tank of the car.
The key is positioned near the windshield wipers of the car.
The key is inserted into the door of the car to open it.

inference.prompt:

(C) The key is inserted into the fuel tank of the car.
(D) The key is positioned near the windshield wipers of the car.
